attributes.action: have the competition rules for the supermarkets based on the time it takes to get there.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, supermarkets can only open a supermarket if it is not within 7 miles of anotheer. However, this is impractical if you live in a place where travelling to the supermarket can take over half an hour. Therefore, I propose that the placement should be based on time taken to get to a supermarket, or have one if there is significant public demand and there are no qualms from local businesses.
